Title: Relates to reducing the cost of textbooks for students of institutions of higher education
Summary: Reduces the cost of textbooks and course materials for students of institutions of higher education by requiring every institution of higher education to adopt policies that allow the use of innovative pricing techniques and payment options for textbooks, supplemental materials, and other course materials or textbooks.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to reducing the cost of textbooks for students of institutions of higher education
